verses.verse: Now when <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> children, she <S%H7065>became<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of her <S%H269>sister;<s%> and she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> me <S%H1121>children,<s%> or <S%H518>else<s%> <S%H369><s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

Then Jacob's <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Am I in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from you the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%>?"

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> is my <S%H519>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> in to her, that she may <S%H3205>bear<s%> on my <S%H1290>knees,<s%> that <S%H4480>through<s%> her I <S%H1571>too<s%> may <S%H1129>have<s%> <S%H1129>children.<s%>"
So she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him her <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> as a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to her.
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Then <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H1777>vindicated<s%> me, and has <S%H1571>indeed<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H1121>son.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>
And Rachel's <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

So <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "With <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H5319>wrestlings<s%> I have <S%H6617>wrestled<s%> with my <S%H269>sister,<s%> [and] I have <S%H1571>indeed<s%> <S%H3201>prevailed.<s%>" And she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

When <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H5975>stopped<s%> <S%H3205>bearing,<s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> her <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And Leah's <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
Then <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "How <S%H1409>fortunate!<s%>" So she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H1410>Gad.<s%>
And Leah's <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
Then <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H837>"Happy<s%> am I! For <S%H1323>women<s%> will <S%H7121>call<s%> me <S%H833>happy.<s%>" So she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

Now in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3812>Leah.<s%> Then <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H4480>some<s%> of your son's <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>"

But she <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "Is it a <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H4592>matter<s%> for you to <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%>? And would you <S%H3947>take<s%> my son's <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>?" So <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> he may <S%H7901>lie<s%> with you <S%H3915>tonight<s%> in <S%H8478>return<s%> for your son's <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>"

When <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> then <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> "You must <S%H935>come<s%> in to me, for I have <S%H7936>surely<s%> <S%H7936>hired<s%> you with my son's <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>" So he <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her that <S%H3915>night.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>gave<s%> <S%H8085>heed<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Then <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me my <S%H7939>wages,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H8198>maid<s%> to my <S%H376>husband.<s%>" So she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H3485>Issachar.<s%>
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

Then <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H2064>endowed<s%> me with a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2065>gift;<s%> <S%H6471>now<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> will <S%H2082>dwell<s%> with me, <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H3205>borne<s%> him <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>" So she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>
And <S%H310>afterward<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> her <S%H1783>Dinah.<s%>
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>gave<s%> <S%H8085>heed<s%> to her and <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>
So she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H622>taken<s%> <S%H622>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>"
And she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3254>give<s%> me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H7971>"Send<s%> me <S%H7971>away,<s%> that I may <S%H1980>go<s%> to my own <S%H4725>place<s%> and to my own <S%H776>country.<s%>

<S%H5414>"Give<s%> [me] my <S%H802>wives<s%> and my <S%H3206>children<s%> for <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> you, and let me <S%H1980>depart;<s%> for you <S%H859>yourself<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5647>rendered<s%> you."

But <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> it <S%H4672>pleases<s%> <S%H2580><s%> you, [stay with me;] I have <S%H5172>divined<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me on your <S%H1558>account.<s%>"
And he <S%H559>continued,<s%> <S%H9344>"Name<s%> me your <S%H7939>wages,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it."

But he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You <S%H859>yourself<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H854>how<s%> <S%H834><s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> you and <S%H854>how<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H4735>cattle<s%> have <S%H1961>fared<s%> with me.

"For you <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> I came, and it has <S%H6555>increased<s%> to a <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you wherever I <S%H7272>turned.<s%> But <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6213>provide<s%> for my own <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>?"

So he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> shall I <S%H5414>give<s%> you?" And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H3972>anything.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> [one] <S%H1697>thing<s%> for me, I will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7462>pasture<s%> [and] <S%H8104>keep<s%> your flock: <S%H6629><s%>

let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H5493>removing<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2345>black<s%> <S%H7716>one<s%> among the <S%H3775>lambs,<s%> and the <S%H2921>spotted<s%> and <S%H5348>speckled<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats;<s%> and [such] shall be my <S%H7939>wages.<s%>

"So my <S%H6666>honesty<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> for me <S%H4279>later,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> my <S%H7939>wages.<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> that is not <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats<s%> and <S%H2345>black<s%> among the <S%H3775>lambs,<s%> [if found] with me, will be considered <S%H1589>stolen.<s%>"
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Good,<s%> let it be according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>"

So he <S%H5493>removed<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6124>striped<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H8495>male<s%> <S%H8495>goats<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H5795>female<s%> <S%H5795>goats,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> with <S%H3836>white<s%> in it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2345>black<s%> <S%H2345>ones<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>care<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> [a distance of] <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> himself and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of Laban's <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3892>fresh<s%> <S%H4731>rods<s%> of <S%H3839>poplar<s%> and <S%H3869>almond<s%> and <S%H6196>plane<s%> <S%H6196>trees,<s%> and <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H6479>stripes<s%> in them, <S%H4286>exposing<s%> the <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] in the <S%H4731>rods.<s%>

And he <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6478>peeled<s%> in <S%H5227>front<s%> of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters,<s%> [even] in the <S%H4325>watering<s%> <S%H8268>troughs,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink;<s%> and they <S%H2552>mated<s%> when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

So the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H2552>mated<s%> by the <S%H4731>rods,<s%> and the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H6124>striped,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H3775>lambs,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6124>striped<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2345>black<s%> in the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban;<s%> and he <S%H7896>put<s%> his own <S%H5739>herds<s%> <S%H905>apart,<s%> and did not <S%H7896>put<s%> them with Laban's <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

Moreover, it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3605>whenever<s%> the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> were <S%H3179>mating,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> would <S%H7760>place<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters,<s%> so that they might <S%H3179>mate<s%> by the <S%H4731>rods;<s%>
but when the <S%H6629>flock<s%> was <S%H5848>feeble,<s%> he did not <S%H7760>put<s%> [them] in; so the <S%H5848>feebler<s%> were Laban's and the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> Jacob's.

So the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6555>became<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6555>prosperous,<s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7227>large<s%> <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> and <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H8198><s%> and <S%H1581>camels<s%> and <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>
